polimi.reds.broker.routing
Class FutureInt

java.lang.Object
  polimi.reds.broker.routing.FutureInt

public class FutureInt
extends java.lang.Object

It contains an int value that can be set in a delayed instant. This is useful when an unknown value must be returned. When that value will be available it can be set using the setValue method. If one tries to read the value before it was set, it is blocked until the value is set.

Author:
Alessandro Monguzzi

Method Detail

isDone

public boolean isDone()
Checks whether the value has been set or not.

Returns:
true iff the value has been set.

setValue

public void setValue(int value)
Sets the value and awake all those were waiting on it.

Parameters:
value - the value to set.

getValue

public int getValue()
Gets the value of the FutureInt. This method is blocking until FutureInt.isDone == true.

Returns:
the value

decrement

public void decrement()
Decrements of 1 the value of the FutureInt. This method is blocking until FutureInt.isDone == true.
